name: Escape from Tarkov
description: Download the installer from your profile: https://www.escapefromtarkov.com/profile.
notes: Click "Cancel" if prompted to install wine-mono. Initial stuttering is expected as the game builds cache. On Mesa drivers the map can load up to 5 minutes on first load. You can toggle "Reduce PulseAudio latency" under "System options" in the "Configure" screen if you encounter any audio glitches/issues. Please read before installing: How to: DXVK To customize the DXVK HUD you can add/remove/change environment variables under "System Options" in the "Configure" screen. Documentation can be found here: https://github.com/doitsujin/dxvk#hud.

files.eft: N/A:Select the exe downloaded from https://www.escapefromtarkov.com/profile

task.description: Installing corefonts and Visual C++ 2013 and 2017
task.name: winetricks

task.description: Installing .NET 4.7.2 (This takes a while, please wait)
task.name: winetricks

task.description: Installing Launcher (UNCHECK "launch after install", otherwise close launcher)
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- eft: N/A:Select the exe downloaded from https://www.escapefromtarkov.com/profile
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Battlestate Games/BsgLauncher/BsgLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2013 vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    description: Installing corefonts and Visual C++ 2013 and 2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472 win7
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2 (This takes a while, please wait)
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Launcher (UNCHECK "launch after install", otherwise close
      launcher)
    executable: eft
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: tkg-4.6-x86_64
